comments.author: Zach Leatherman
comments.message:
Actually, that looks like a decent service. I'd be interested to test the quality and see the library selection. $9.99 a month for unlimited downloading?

They say they have a Pay Per View option for movies still in the theaters, but it looks like all the titles I've seen in their "Top Movies" category with the Pay Per View icon are available on DVD right now: Pirates of the Caribbean 3, Ratatouille, plus a few others.

The next time I'm bored at home, I might try it out. It looks like Netflix is investing some money into improving their library, although it still isn't where I'd like it to be.
